data.value:
New Weapon Featured Draw have a wishlist to which you can add certain weapons of your choice. The wishlist increases your odds of obtaining a <sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196> weapon from that list. 
*Draws may also yield weapons that are not in your wishlist.
<color=#FF9292>*WishList settings will not be transferred to other New Weapon Featured Draw.</color>

This Draw have a wishlist to which you can add certain weapons of your choice. The wishlist increases your odds of obtaining a <sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196> weapon from that list. 
*Draws may also yield weapons that are not in your wishlist.
<color=#FF9292>*WishList settings will not be transferred to other draw.</color>

This Draw have a wishlist to which you can add certain weapons of your choice. The wishlist increases your odds of obtaining a <sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196> weapon from that list. 
*In this Draw, only <sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196><sprite="tmp_icon" index=196> weapons that are selected on the Wishlist will appear.
<color=#FF9292>*Wishlist settings from this Draw will not be carried over to other New Weapon Featured Draws.</color>

With the stamp card, you'll receive a reward or bonus for every stamp obtained. You can obtain up to twelve stamps at once based on probabilities.
*Stamps can be obtained through "Draw 10." Stamps cannot be obtained through "Draw 1."

To view reward details, check out the stamp card on the Draws page.

With the stamp card, you'll receive a reward or bonus for every stamp obtained. You can obtain up to twelve stamps at once based on probabilities.
*Stamps can be obtained through "Draw 10." Stamps cannot be obtained through "Draw 1."

To view reward details, check out the stamp card on the Draws page.
- Stamp card content may change without notice.
*These are some of the rewards that can be acquired by obtaining stamps.
